action_output:
Reason: The user wants to switch to the QuickNote feature inside the Markor app. To do this, I need to open the Markor app first. Since the app is not visible on the home screen, I will use the `open_app` action to open it directly.
Action: {"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Markor"}

summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Markor"}. Successfully opened the Markor app to proceed with switching to its QuickNote feature.
